content: double_crochet in next double_crochet fpdc around next fpdc around join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-3 finish off 16 double_crochet 16 fpdc note when joining a new color with a double_crochet at the beg of a round you can substitute by joining with slip_stitch chain 3 round 5 join b with double_crochet to any st double_crochet in next st chain 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts chain 1 around join with slip_stitch to top of beg double_crochet finish off 32 double_crochet 16 chain-1 round 6 join c with single_crochet to any chain-1 space chain 1 shell in next chain-1 space chain 1 single_crochet in next chain-1 space around omitting last single_crochet join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet finish off 8 shells 16 chain-1 8 single_crochet round 7 join a with single_crochet to the 3rd middle treble_crochet of any shell chain 2 skip next 2 treble_crochet v-st in next single_crochet chain 2 skip next 2 treble_crochet single_crochet in next treble_crochet 3rd treble_crochet of shell around omitting last single_crochet join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet finish off 8 v-st 16 chain-2 8 single_crochet round 8 join d with single_crochet to any chain-2 space 2 single_crochet in same space 3 single_crochet in each chain-2 space around join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet do not finish off 72 single_crochet round 9 cont with d chain 5 count as double_crochet chain 2 dc3tog over next 3 sts chain 2 double_crochet in next st chain 2 around omitting last double_crochet chain 2 join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-5 finish off 18 dc3tog 18 double_crochet 36 chain-2 note round 10 will only be worked in chain-2 sps the end of the round utilizes a double_crochet join see special stitches round 10 join b with slip_stitch to any chain-2 space chain 5 count as dtr 2 dtr in same space 3 treble_crochet in next chain-2 space 3 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 3 half_double_crochet in next chain-2 space 3 single_crochet in next chain-2 space twice 3 half_double_crochet in next chain-2 space 3 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 3 treble_crochet in next chain-2 space 3 dtr chain 2 3 dtr in next chain-2 space around omitting last 3 dtr chain 2 3 dtr 3 dtr in beg chain-2 space to complete first corner join with double_crochet to top of beg chain-5 do not finish off per side 6 dtr 6 treble_crochet 6 double_crochet 6 half_double_crochet 6 single_crochet / 4 chain-2 for corners round 11 cont with b chain 3 count as double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same space skip first treble_crochet after corner double_crochet in next 29 sts 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next corner chain-2 space around omitting last 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet join with slip_stitch
